attributes.title: Causes Stupidity ğŸ˜±ğŸ˜±
attributes.review: Would definitely not recommend this app. When I open the page I immediately saw an orange Cheeto. Which caused my head to hurt and my eyes sore. I immediately forgot any common sense and all intelligence left my body. Because of my eyes being sore I fell down the stairs. Because of my fall I hit my head many times and was teleported into a different dimension called gendhdjrndjxb. Where the Loch Ness monster almost ate me. Causing me to fall on my Hiney. Also after I fell I turned into Mickey Mouse.Then I was transported back to my house where is the orange Cheeto was staring back at me. He was using its hyuge hands to eat poop. I was so disgusted that I ran out of my house and got hit by a unicorn. Would not recommend this app unless you want to lose your mind.
